ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend the course as a way to review basic inflammation literature and see inflammation from a new and unique perspective.
Informal discussion of multiple aspects of inflammation. Lectures build on concepts from week to week effectively. Watching Ruslan present the material is a worthwhile experience. Highly recommended.
Yes I would recommend other students to take this class
A conceptual framework for thinking about tissue regulation, homeostasis, and adaptation.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The course provides a unique perspective on inflammation and physiological homeostasis. It potentiates broader thinking about my research.
It gave me a deeper understanding of the current way of thinking in immunology.
Has definitely affected the way that I will be thinking about and tackling my PhD work. I am in BME.
